main event: A round, brilliant light was observed drifting slowly in Macnilto, Okinawa on September 25, 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as a round, brilliant light with no sound., The observation was made during local time., The object drifted slowly across the sky., The report concluded that it was likely a balloon after a weather balloon had been launched in the area., This sighting was recorded as part of Project Blue Book's investigations.
witness description: noting officer states that the observation was made during ground-visual
